text: فَأَقۡبَلَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ فِي صَرَّةٖ فَصَكَّتۡ وَجۡهَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٞ

translation.en: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman
translation.id: Kemudian istrinya datang memekik (tercengang) lalu menepuk wajahnya sendiri seraya bekata, "(Aku ini) seorang perempuan tua yang mandul
